Player History
Injured on 9/14/1965 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Series with Pittsburgh in 1966...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/18/1967 to a 2-year deal worth $10,500,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1968, winning 2 games with a 0.53 ERA...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/1/1969 to a 4-year deal worth $1,210,000 per year...
Injured on 5/11/1975 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Earned first career win on 4/24/1980...
